description:
Sakura has to adjust to Dokuro, her killings, his classmates wailing on him, and trying to maintain his sanity.
Sakura meets Sabato where she and Dokuro finally explain why they have been sent to assassinate him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bokusatsu Tenshi Da yo! Dokuro-chan! / Mirai kara no Shikyaku Da yo! Dokuro-chan!
It`s the Bludgeoning Angel! Dokuro-chan! / It`s the Assassin from the Future! Dokuro-chan!
Je suis l`ange tueur ! Dokuro-chan ! / Le tueur venu du futur ! Dokuro-chan !
撲殺天使だよ! ドクロちゃん! / 未来からの刺客だよ! ドクロちゃん!
